Team4450.Lib

Class LCD

  • java.lang.Object
    • Team4450.Lib.LCD

  • public class LCD
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface class for Driver Station LCD panel.

      • print

        public static void print(int line,
                         int column,
                         java.lang.String message,
                         java.lang.Object... parms)
        Print data to LCD line starting at column (no clear of line).
        Parameters:
        line - LCD line to print on (1-based).
        column - Column in which to start printing (1-based).
        message - Message to display with optional formatting parameters.
        parms - optional objects matching formatting parameters.

      • printLine

        message - Message to display with optional formatting parameters.
        parms - optional objects matching formatting parameters.

      • clearAll

        Clear all LCD lines.
